Package Library

Class Lib

extends java.lang.Object

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addBook​(User u, Book b)
      Adds a book to the library.
      void addUser​(User u)
      Adds users in the library system.
      void deleteBook​(User u, Book b)
      Deletes a book and all its available copies from the library's book repository.
      void printAllBooks()
      Returns a list of all books available in the Library sorted by name.
      void printAllUsers()
      Prints all users of the system sorted by name: showing their names, ID, registration date and ststus(admin or reader)

      returns a list of books and corresponding users who rent them.

      returns books rent by a user u

      a single copy of the book is deducted from the book repository when a book is rent.

      • Lib

        public Lib()
        Default Constructor

    • Method Detail

      • rentBook

        public void rentBook​(User u,
                     Book b)
        a single copy of the book is deducted from the book repository when a book is rent. The function should give an exception if the book does not exist in the repository.
        Parameters:
        u - A user who rents a book
        b - The book to be rent

      • printRentBooks

        public void printRentBooks​(Reader u)
        returns books rent by a user u
        Parameters:
        u - A user whose rent books wants to be printed

      • printRentBooks

        public void printRentBooks​(Admin u)
        returns a list of books and corresponding users who rent them.

      • addBook

        public void addBook​(User u,
                    Book b)
        Adds a book to the library. If a book does not exist in the repository, the function adds a single copy of the book to the repository, If the book exists then number of its copies is incremented.
        Parameters:
        u - A user who performs the adding operation.
        b - The book that is added.

      • addUser

        public void addUser​(User u)
        Adds users in the library system.
        Parameters:
        u - A user to be added into the system

      • deleteBook

        public void deleteBook​(User u,
                       Book b)
        Deletes a book and all its available copies from the library's book repository. The function gives an exception if no copies of the book to be deleted exists in the repository.
        Parameters:
        u - A user who performs the deletion operation.
        b - The book that is deleted.

      • printAllUsers

        public void printAllUsers()
        Prints all users of the system sorted by name: showing their names, ID, registration date and ststus(admin or reader)

      • printAllBooks

        public void printAllBooks()
        Returns a list of all books available in the Library sorted by name.
